main event: Multiple unidentified flying object sightings reported in Homestead City, Florida during July 1967.
interesting points: One sighting lasted 3-5 minutes with a round object emitting a white-yellow glow., Witnesses reported hearing sound during the first sighting, but the second sighting was silent., A 15-year-old girl insisted on her sighting of a 'flying saucer' despite skepticism., Multiple reports and investigations were conducted by the Air Force regarding the sightings., The object showed erratic movements including shooting straight up and down before disappearing.
sighted object: a bright white light or round object with a yellow glow
witness description: Delila and her husband Merle, and security policemen
